title: Goldman Sachs CEO: Bitcoin Isn’t a Dollar Threat
content: Despite the growing popularity of cryptocurrencies, Solomon believes that BTC is not a threat to the US Dollar. Solomon’s statement comes at a time when digital currencies are becoming more mainstream, with many investors seeing Bitcoin as a store of value and hedge against inflation. title: Tron’s Justin Sun Explains Why Trump Is Stacking WBTC for Bitcoin Reserves

title: Bitcoin Anticipated To Reach Over 70 All-Time Highs This Year
content: According to Foresight News, CoinDesk analyst Van Straten suggests that Bitcoin is expected to achieve more than 70 all-time highs this year. This prediction is based on the cryptocurrency's price performance, which is showing similarities to its behavior in 2017.

title: Is A US Bitcoin Reserve Priced In? Analyst Shares Eye-Opening Facts

title: Ross Ulbricht’s Hidden Fortune: $47M in Bitcoin Still Untouched After 13 Years
content: Bitcoin wallets linked to Ross Ulbricht, founder of the Silk Road marketplace, remain untouched and hold approximately 430 BTC, worth around $47 million today, according to Coinbase director Conor Grogan. The post Ross Ulbricht’s Hidden Fortune: $47M in Bitcoin Still Untouched After 13 Years appeared first on Cryptodnes.
